warning.message: You will be teleported home in 20 mins. Please be ready...
config.warp-time.name: Warp Time
config.warp-time.desc: The time (in 24h format) when you will be teleported home (e.g., 2540 = 1:40 AM).
config.warning-time.name: Warning Time
config.warning-time.desc: The time (in 24h format) when the warning message appears.
config.warning-msg.name: Warning Message
config.warning-msg.desc: The message displayed to the player.
config.target-loc.name: Target Location
config.target-loc.desc: The internal map name of your home (Default: FarmHouse).
config.target-x.name: Target X
config.target-x.desc: The X coordinate tile to land on.
config.target-y.name: Target Y
config.target-y.desc: The Y coordinate tile to land on.
